com.pcloud.sdk

Class DownloadOptions.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pcloud.sdk.DownloadOptions.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    DownloadOptions

    public static class DownloadOptions.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder for configuring and creating new DownloadOptions instances.

    For more details see here

    See Also:
    DownloadOptions.newBuilder(), DownloadOptions.create()

    • Method Detail

      • skipFilename

        public DownloadOptions.Builder skipFilename(boolean skipFilename)
        Parameters:
        skipFilename - true to omit the filename in the generated link, false otherwise
        Returns:
        the same DownloadOptions.Builder instance

      • forceDownload

        public DownloadOptions.Builder forceDownload(boolean forceDownload)
        Sets forceDownload option.

        If forceDownload is TRUE content-type will be set to application/octet-stream. In this case content-type option should be set to null.

        For more details see here

        Parameters:
        forceDownload - true to force a download, false otherwise
        Returns:
        the same DownloadOptions.Builder instance

      • contentType

        public DownloadOptions.Builder contentType(java.lang.String contentType)
        Sets contentType option.

        contentType option can be null. If it is left to null the API will return FileLink with default content-type for the file extension.

        For more details see here

        Parameters:
        contentType - a content type
        Returns:
        the same DownloadOptions.Builder instance

      • build

        public DownloadOptions build()
        Creates new DownloadOptions with the set skipFilename, forceDownload and contentType options.
        Returns:
        a new DownloadOptions object with the configuration from this build
